wikipedia_page.main: Air Chief Marshal Sir Arthur Penrose Martyn Sanders,  (17 March 1898 – 8 February 1974) was a Royal Flying Corps pilot during the First World War and a senior Royal Air Force commander during the Second World War and the immediate post-war years.
